Trusted by Companies like

Awesome App features

Increase productivity with a simple to-do app. App for
managing your personal budgets

Get your blood delivered at home collect sample from the news your blood tests

Prototyping

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-banner', templateUrl: './banner.component.html', styleUrls: ['./banner.component.css'] }) export class BannerComponent { imgLeft: String = 'assets/images/featureLeft.png'; imgIcon:String = 'assets/images/fastperform.png' imgArray : any[] = [ 'assets/images/banner1.png', 'assets/images/anubis.png', 'assets/images/maniac.png', 'assets/images/express.png', 'assets/images/banner1.png' ] }
